key.name: device-names
key.description: A list of device names to be added to those that can be auto-discovered

key.name: default-latitude
key.description: Default Latitude when no GPS

key.name: default-longitude
key.description: Default Longitude when no GPS

key.name: default-loiter
key.description: Default Loiter time

key.name: default-altitude
key.description: Default Altitude for mission (m)

key.name: default-nav-speed
key.description: Default Nav speed (m/s). For calculating durations only.

key.name: default-map
key.description: Default map *key*

key.name: default-zoom
key.description: Default map zoom

key.name: speak-interval
key.description: Interval between voice prompts, 0 disables

key.name: dump-unknown
key.description: dump unknown message payload (debug aid)

key.name: display-dms
key.description: Show positions as dd:mm:ss rather than decimal degrees

key.name: map-sources
key.description: JSON file defining additional map sources

key.name: espeak-voice
key.description: Default espeak voice (see espeak documentation)

key.name: speechd-voice
key.description: Default speechd voice (see speechd documentation)

key.name: flite-voice-file
key.description: Default flite voice file (full path, *.flitevox), see flite documentation)

key.name: audio-on-arm
key.description: Option to start audio on arm (and stop on disarm)

key.name: log-on-arm
key.description: Option to start logging on arm (and stop on disarm)

key.name: auto-follow
key.description: Option to set auto-follow on start (track vehicle)

key.name: baudrate
key.description: Serial baud rate

key.name: beep
key.description: Option to emit an alert sound for alerts.

key.name: atstart
key.summary: Something that is executed at startup
key.description: e.g. `gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power idle-dim false`. See also `manage-power` (and consider setting to true).

key.name: atexit
key.summary: Something that is executed at exit
key.description: e.g. `gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power idle-dim true`. See also `manage-power` (and consider setting `manage-power` to `true` instead).

key.name: vlevels
key.description: Semi-colon(;) separated list of *cell* voltages values for transition between voltage label colours

key.name: poll-timeout
key.description: Timeout in milliseconds for telemetry poll messages. Note that timer loop has a resolution of 10ms.

key.name: display-distance
key.description: 0=metres, 1=feet, 2=yards

key.name: display-speed
key.description: 0=metres/sec, 1=kilometres/hour, 2=miles/hour, 3=knots

key.name: gpsintvl
key.description: Gps sanity time (m/s), check for current fix

key.name: uilang
key.description: "en" do everything as English (UI numeric decimal points, voice), "ev" do voice as English (so say 'point' for decimals even when shown as 'comma')

key.name: rings-colour
key.description: Range rings colour as well know string or #RRGGBBAA

key.name: rth-autoland
key.description: Automatically assert land on RTH waypoints

key.name: ignore-nm
key.description: Linux / FreeBSD : Set to true to always ignore NM status (may slow down startup)

key.name: mission-path
key.description: Directory for mission files, default / not set = current directory

key.name: kml-path
key.description: Directory for KML overlays, default / not set = current directory

key.name: log-path
key.description: Directory for log files (for replay), default = current directory

key.name: log-save-path
key.description: Directory for log files (for save), default / not set = current directory

key.name: sqlite-log-path
key.summary: Directory to save SQLite log files
key.description: Directory to save SQLite log files, if not set, SQLite log files ("Interactive FlightLog replay" are not persisted.

key.name: speech-api
key.description: On of espeak, speechd, flite. Only change this if you know you have the required development files at build time

key.name: max-home-delta
key.description: Maximum variation of home position without verbal alert

key.name: stats-timeout
key.description: Timeout before the flight statistics popup automatically closes. A value of 0 means no timeout.

key.name: auto-restore-mission
key.summary: Whether to automatically import a mission in FC memory to MWP
key.description: If the FC holds a valid mission in memory, and there is no mission loaded into MWP, this setting controls whether MWP automatically downloads the mission.

key.name: forward
key.description: Types of message to forward (none, LTM, minLTM, minMAV, all, MSP1, MSP2, MAV1, MAV2)

key.name: smartport-fuel-unit
key.description: Units label for smartport fuel (none, %, mAh, mWh)

key.name: wp-text-style
key.summary: Style of text used for next WP display
key.description: Defines the way the WP numbers are displayed. Font, size and RGBA description (or well known name, with alpha)

key.name: wp-spotlight
key.description: Defines RGBA colour for 'next way point' highlight

key.name: flash-warn
key.description: If a dataflash is configured for black box, and this key is non-zero, a warning in generated if the data flash is greater than "flash-warn" percent full.

key.name: osd-mode
key.summary: Data items overlaid on the map OSD
key.description: 0 = none, 1 = current WP/Max WP, 2 = next WP distance and course. This is a mask, so 3 means both OSD items.

key.name: wp-dist-size
key.summary: Font size (points) for OSD WP distance display
key.description: Font size (points) for OSD WP distance display

key.name: adjust-tz
key.description: Option for whether mwp should adjust FC's TZ (and DST) based on the local clock

key.name: blackbox-decode
key.description: Name of the blackbox_decode application (in case there are separate for iNav and betaflight)

key.name: geouser
key.description: A user account to query geonames.org for blackbox log timezone info. A default account of 'mwptools' is provided; however users are requested to create their own account.

key.name: zone-detect
key.summary: Application to return timezone from location
key.description: If supplied, the application will be used to return the timezone (in preference to geonames.org). The application should take latitude and longitude as parameters. See samples/tzget.sh

key.name: mag-sanity
key.description: Mwp offers a primitive mag sanity checker that compares compass heading with GPS course over the ground using LTM (only). There are various hard-coded constraints (speed > 3m/s, certain flight modes) and two configurable parameters that should be set here in order to enable this check. The parameters are angular difference (⁰) and duration (s). The author finds a settings of 45,3 (i.e. 45⁰ over 3 seconds) works OK, detecting real instances (a momentarily breaking cable) and not reporting false positives.

key.name: say-bearing
key.description: Whether audio report includes bearing

key.name: pos-is-centre
key.description: Whether the position label is the map centre or the pointer location

key.name: delta-minspeed
key.summary: Minimum speed for elapsed distance updates
key.description: Minimum speed for elapsed distance updates (m/s). Default is zero, which means the elapsed distance is always updated; larger values will take out hover / jitter movements.

key.name: speak-amps
key.description: Enumeration of none, live-n, all-n n=1,2,4 : n = how often spoken (modulus basically)

key.name: max-radar-slots
key.summary: Maximum number of INAV Radar vehicles
key.description: Maximum number of vehicles reported by INAV Radar

key.name: arming-speak
key.description: Whether to reporting arming state by audio

key.name: manage-power
key.description: Whether to manage idle and screen saver

key.name: uc-mission-tags
key.description: If true, MISSION, VERSION and MISSIONITEM tags are upper case (for interoperability with legacy Android applications)

key.name: mission-meta-tag
key.summary: Use meta vice mwp in mission file
key.description: If true, the legacy 'mwp' tag for optional data in mission files is named 'meta'

key.name: autoload-safehomes
key.description: If true, then safehomes will be loaded from the FC on connection.

key.name: max-climb-angle
key.summary: Maximum climb angle highlight for terrain analysis
key.description: If non-zero, any climb angles exceeding the specified value will be highlighted in Terrain Analysis - Climb / Dive report. Note that the absolute value is taken as a positive (climb) angle

key.name: max-dive-angle
key.summary: Maximum dive angle highlight for terrain analysis
key.description: If non-zero, any dive angles exceeding the specified value will be highlighted in Terrain Analysis Climb / Dive report. Note that the absolute value is taken as a negative (dive) angle

key.name: max-wps
key.description: Maximum number of WP supported (should match most capable FC firmware)

key.name: radar-list-max-altitude
key.summary: Maximum altitude for targets to show in the radar list view
key.description: Maximum altitude (metres) to include targets in the radar list view. Targets higher than this value will show only in the map view. This is mainly for ADS-B receivers where there is no need for high altitude targets to be shown. Setting to 0 disables. Note that ADS-B altitudes are AMSL (or geoid).

key.name: radar-alert-altitude
key.summary: Altitude below which ADS-B alerts may be generated
key.description: Target altitude (metres) below which ADS-B proximity alerts may be generated. Requires that 'radar-alert-range' is also set (non-zero). Setting to 0 disables. Note that ADS-B altitudes are AMSL (or geoid).

key.name: radar-alert-range
key.summary: Range below which ADS-B alerts may be generated
key.description: Target range (metres) below which ADS-B proximity alerts may be generated. Requires that 'radar-alert-altitude' is also set (non-zero). Setting to 0 disables.

key.name: radar-alert-min-speed
key.summary: Speed above which ADS-B alerts may be generated
key.description: Target speed (metres/sec) above which ADS-B proximity alerts may be generated. Requires that 'radar-alert-altitude' and "radar-alert-range" are also set.

key.name: gpsd-host
key.description: Provider for GCS icon location via gpsd. Default is "localhost", can be set to other host name or IP address. Setting blank ('') disables.

key.name: ident-limit
key.description: Timeout value in seconds for a MSP FC to reply to a MSP_INDENT probe. Effectively a timeout counter in seconds. Set to a negative value to disable.

key.name: show-sticks
key.summary: Whether to show stick poisitons in log replay
key.description: If "yes", stick position is shown bottom right during log replay, if "no" , never shown. If "icon", then it shown iconified (bottom right)

key.name: msp2-adsb
key.description: Options for requesting MSP2_ADSB_VEHICLE_LIST. "off": never request, "on:" always request, "auto:" heuristic based on serial settings / bandwidth

key.name: sidebar-type
key.description: Options for the sidebar type. Unless you know better, leave at auto

key.name: view-mode
key.description: Options for model view map display

key.name: los-margin
key.description: Margin(m) for LOS Analysis

key.name: p-pane-width
key.description: Please do not change this unless you appreciate the consequences

key.name: ga-range
key.description: 0=m, 1=km, 2=miles, 3=nautical miles

key.name: ga-speed
key.description: 0=m/s, 1=kph, 2=mph, 3=knots

key.name: bluez-disco
key.description: (Linux only) Only discovered Bluetooth serial devices with non-zero RSSI will be offered

key.name: autoload-geozones
key.description: Autoload geozones from FC on FC connect, remove from display on FC disconnect

key.name: min-dem-zoom
key.description: DEMs will not be fetched if zoom is below this value

key.name: mapbox-apikey
key.description: Mapbox API key, enables Mapbox as a map Provider. Setting blank ('') disables, unless the API key is in the `libsecret` credential store.

key.name: symbol-scale
key.description: Symbol scale factor, scales map symbols as multiplier (see also `touch-scale`),

key.name: touch-scale
key.description: Symbol scale factor, scales map symbols as multiplier (for touch screens); (see also `symbol-scale`),

key.name: mission-icon-alpha
key.description: Alpha (opacity) for mission icons in the range 0 - 255.

key.name: armed-msp-placebo
key.description: Whether to suppress desensitising of MSP action items when armed.

key.name: assist-key
key.description: Ublox Assist now key. Setting blank ('') disables, unless the API key is in the `libsecret` credential store.

key.name: mwxml-version
key.description: Version value in MW XML mission files. Legacy MW requires `2.3 pre8`. Note that INAV mission files may not be NOT compatible with legacy MW (and vice versa). If not set, the mwp version number is used.

key.name: mavlink-sysid
key.description: System ID in the range 2-255 (see MAVlink documentation and particularly the GCS guidance, 2nd paragraph ibid)

key.name: no-poller-pause
key.summary: Don't pause the MSP poller for bulk transfers
key.description: Traditionally, mwp pauses the MSP poller for bulk transfers (WP, Geozone, Safehome). This option allows polling to continue, interleaved with the bulk transfer.

key.name: msprc-enabled
key.description: Whether MSP_SET_RAW_RC message transmission is enabled. Requires a mapping file

key.name: msprc-full-duplex
key.description: Use full duplex transmission for MSP_SET_RAW_RC messages. This will better ensure that the cycle-time requirement is met. If the device does not support full duplex, enabling this will result in major telemetry failure.

key.name: msprc-cycletime
key.description: Cycle time (ms) for MSP_SET_RAW_RC messages (if enabled). INAV requires a minimum of 5Hz refresh (200ms). A lower cycle time will improve RC response but reduce the MSP telemetry refresh rate

key.name: msprc-settings
key.description: Mapping file defining the mapping between handset input devices to RC channels for MSP_SET_RAW_RC messages

key.name: default-video-uri
key.description: Default entry in the video player URI chooser

key.name: touch-drag-disconnected
key.description: If true, dragging a mission point on a touch screen will disconnect the marker from the path, and reconnect it when the drag is completed. This may improve touch drag behaviour.
